sections.text:
15-247.Election districts; establishment.

A city of the primary class may divide the city into election districts, establish the boundaries thereof, and number the election districts.

SourceLaws 1901, c. 16, § 129, XLVII, p. 139;R.S.1913, § 4457;C.S.1922, § 3842;C.S.1929, § 15-245;R.S.1943, § 15-247;Laws 2020, LB1003, § 62.
